Ontario Power Marketing OpportunitiesIMAGE IMAGE Market operations fundamentals In May Ontario Canadas most industrialized province will deregulate its electricity market Are you fully informed about the new market structure and ready to take advantage of the business opportunities it represents Click here for free summary and table of contents Timely information and analysis New York City based energy consulting firm Utilis Energy offers a thorough appraisal of deregulation in Ontario Our study Explores the role of the Independent Market Operator Explains how spot market power prices will be derermined Offers detailed year electricity demand forecasts Provides indepth commercial industrial load profile data Click here for free summary and table of contents or call Utilis Energy on IMAGE a better understanding of Ontarios electricity market its operations fundamentals and end user load profiles IMAGE participation requirements necessary to become an energy service provider IMAGE knowledge needed to develop a targeted marketing and customer acquisition strategy Click here for free summary and table of contents or call Utilis Energy on Utilis Energy respects your privacy We never pass your information along to third parties If you have received this message in error or prefer not to receive communications from Utilis Energy please reply to this email with the word REMOVE in the subject line
